openings.notes: Aligned with Vastu principles for auspicious entry; placed on the east.
Large windows to enhance natural lighting and ventilation, in line with Bohemian aesthetics.

openings.location: between living room and home office
openings.notes: Soundproofing considerations for privacy of home office.
Provides easy access to the garden; enhances connectivity with nature.

garden.description: Large garden space integrated with outdoor seating area and natural water features.

split_levels.description: The bungalow is designed as a split-level structure, with subtle elevation changes to differentiate living areas, promoting privacy and distinct functions. The design incorporates sloped landings.

vastu_considerations: Main entrance on the east for positive energy.
Placement of family room in the northern zone for harmony.
Kitchen and home office positioned away from entry to minimize distractions.
